name: Space Porter (itch)
description:
Space Porter

You have 1 minute to deliver an important package, but you are in space! Time is somewhat relative when you travel faster than light.

How to play?

Controls: <right>: accelerate; <left>: brake

You need to control your ship during faster than light jumps. The goal is to stop your ship in the slowing zone:

If your ship is too fast, you will crash!

The faster you travel, the slower the time will pass! There is two clocks:

  • On the left: the time relative to your client
  • On the right: the time relative to you

How much jumps will you do in 1-ish minute?

Warning: there is no satisfying ending! I didn't had time to work on that.

Some notes and issues

So there's some points that needs improving:

  • Better tuning of acceleration/brake values
  • Better relative time system
  • Better title and endings
  • Better space animations
